actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the flags of all Federal buildings shall be flown at half-staff in honor of our men captured and missing in action.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the flags of all Federal buildings shall be flown at halfstaff on the last day of each month until the captured and missing in action are properly accounted for.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the flags of all Federal buildings shall be flown at half-staff in honor of our men captured and missing in action.
